about_the_game:
Embark on a quietly gripping adventure in "What happened to Kate", a single-player mystery-puzzle game that weaves a tale of intrigue, discovery, and unexpected connections. When your coworker disappears without a trace, leaving behind a series of cryptic clues, you find yourself standing at the threshold of their seemingly ordinary home. But as the door clicks shut behind you, you realize this place holds secrets that are anything but ordinary.

In "What happened to Kate", you'll navigate through a richly detailed and atmospheric environment, where every object tells a part of the story. Your quest to find your coworker will challenge your wit and will, as you solve a variety of puzzles ranging from hidden objects to complex cryptographic enigmas, each unraveling the threads of a much larger mystery.

Key Features:

Immersive Storytelling: Dive deep into a narrative-rich world where every clue uncovers a fragment of your coworker's hidden life and the truth behind their disappearance.
Varied Puzzles: Test your problem-solving skills with an array of puzzles that blend logical thinking, environmental manipulation, and keen observation.
Atmospheric Exploration: Experience a game where the setting itself is a character, crafted with attention to detail, inviting you to explore its secrets and absorb its eerie ambiance.
Engaging Mechanics: From digital footprints to psychological puzzles, engage in gameplay that challenges both your intellect and your perceptions.
"What happened to Kate" is not just a game; it's a journey into the heart of mystery, a puzzle box designed to be opened layer by layer. Whether you're deciphering a hidden message or choosing how deeply to delve into the personal life of your coworker, every decision brings you closer to the truth.

Are you ready to listen to search for Kate? Your search begins now.

highlighted.name: Place All Chess Pieces in Place

name: What happened to Kate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti or AMD R9 380
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "What happened to Kate" is a gripping puzzle adventure set in a mysteriously silent home. Unravel your coworker's disappearance through challenging puzzles. Delve into the depths of mystery and discover what lies within the quiet.
